jobDescription: About UFP Technologies: UFP Technologies is a producer of innovative custom-engineered components, products, and specialty packaging. Using foams, plastics, composites, and natural fiber materials, we design and manufacture a vast range of solutions primarily for the medical, automotive, aerospace & defense, electronics, consumer, and industrial markets. Our team acts as an extension of customers’ in-house research, engineering and manufacturing groups, working closely with them to solve their most complex product and packaging challenges. For our customers, innovation takes many shapes. But each solution is shaped by a level of design, materials and process expertise that is unique to UFP Technologies. Position Location: Grand Rapids, MI Summary: Provides quality engineering technical support to the entire business related to corrective actions, process control, statistical analysis, customer complaints, component validation, product measurement and testing, product launch, product certification, and audits.
